Name: Number of Sprints
Description: Total number of sprints in the project

Name: Sprint Length
Description: Duration of each sprint in days

Name: Team Size
Description: Number of members in the team

Name: Story Points
Description: Estimated story points for a user story

Name: Task Effort
Description: Estimated effort in hours for a task

Name: Budget per Feature
Description: Budget allocated to a specific feature

Name: Features per Release
Description: Number of features included in a release

Name: Tasks per Story
Description: Number of tasks defined for a user story

Name: Daily Scrum Duration
Description: Length of daily scrum meeting in minutes

Name: Test Coverage Percentage
Description: Percentage of code covered by tests
